actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to make the application of certain Social Security Act programs in the Commonwealth of the Northern Marianas comparable with the application of such programs in other territories of the United States.

summary.text: Applies to the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands the provisions of specified programs of the Social Security Act which are now applicable to Guam, Puerto Rico, and the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to make the application of certain Social Security Act programs in the Commonwealth of the Northern Marianas comparable with the application of such programs in other territories of the United States.
